description.adf.content: [{'content': [{'text': 'iMMAP Inc. to provide second session for the training', 'type': 'text'}], 'type': 'paragraph'}]
[{'content': [{'text': 'A follow up training to be conducted in Pemba in person. ', 'type': 'text'}], 'type': 'paragraph'}]

locations.text: Our offices in Maputo, Cabo Delgado, Nampula, Niassa, Zambezia, Sofala
description.adf.content: [{'content': [{'text': 'ActionAind Mozambique is a NNGO working in all the country provinces except Manica. We work in humanitarian response, women’s rights and education and democratic governance and youth empowerment. In each of the sectors we have different projects, implemented in different locations directly by ActionAid or by our local implementation partners. ', 'type': 'text'}], 'type': 'paragraph'}, {'content': [{'text': 'Our big challenge is our data management since collection, processing, feed the projects and the organization strategic indicators framework, sharing and data use for decision making within our collaborative multilocation intervention. ', 'type': 'text'}], 'type': 'paragraph'}, {'content': [{'text': 'This year we are starting a new strategic plan 2024 - 2028 and we see on iMMAP our opportunity to create and develop our and partners capacity on better management and data use for decision making.', 'type': 'text'}], 'type': 'paragraph'}]
